item.title: [Delta]How to make a mage system?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Hey guys. How do I make one? I tryed, I mean, like, REALLY tryed.

My code:

package org.deltaoptimized.skills.combat.Magic;

import org.deltaoptimized.player.model.Client;

	public class Magic {
		final Client c;
	public void Magic(Client client) {
		this.c = c;
		if (c.isMaging == true) {
			startMage();
		}
		if (c.isHurt == true) {
			damageDealt = true;
		}

		int magicHit
		int Hit
		int Hurt
		int Damage
		int damageDealt
		int Death

		if (c.startedMage && died = true) {
			continueMage = true;
		} else if (c.noStartedMage = true) {
			c.noStartedMage = false;
			startMage();
		}
		if (c.noobLevel = 99) {
			c.mageLevel = 99;
		} else if (c.teleport = true) {
			teleport(c.PosX, c.PosY, c.Heightlvl);
			dead = true;
			loseItems = true;
		}
	}
	public void lostItems() {
		if(c.lostItems = true) {
			c.startCryEmote();
		} else if c.loseItems = false) {
			loseItems = true
			c.startCryEmote();
		}
	}
	public void Projectile(int PosX, int PosY, int Dead) {
		if (c.teleAction = true) {
			teleTo(PosX, PosY)
			c.dead = true;
			getLostItemActions();
		}
	}
	public void getLostItemActions() {
		return lostItems;
	}
	public void staffs() {
		final int[] staffs = {1216, 1218, 1220, 1222};
		final int[] spells = {water, fire, air, earth};

		if (c.hasItem == staffs) {
			int water = 0;
			int earth = 1;
			int air = 2;
			int fire = 3;
			int allElements = fire + air + earth + water;
			switch (allElements) {
				case 0:
					decrease Int 555
					break;
					//TODO
			} else if (c.hasItem == notStaffs) {
				dead = true;
			}
			if (c.noobLevel == 80) {
				mageLevel = 1999999232;
				unbeatable = true;
				pwnznoobs = true;
			} else if (c.programmer = You) {
				int programmer;
				programmer = You;
				programmer = noobLevel = 99;
			} else if (c.programmer = Me) {
				int programmer;
				programmer = Me;
				programmer = Best Coder in Mopar;
			} else if (c.player = You) {
				int player;
				player = You;
				dead = true;
			} else if (c.player = You) {
				int player;
				player = You;
				c.playerMageLevel = -46387628;
			} else if (c.player = Me) {
				int player;
				player = Me;
				c.admin = true;
				pwnYou = true;
				killEveryone = true;
				youAreANoob = true;
				otherCannotLogOff = true;
			} else if (c.player = You) { //To make it sucure anyone besides me cannot log off while in mage
				int player;
				player = You;
				c.noobLevel = 892427;
				c.noob = true;
				dead = true
						cannotLogOff = true;
				cannotShutDownComputer = true;
			}

			cannotLogOff = ignore.case = c.playername("RandQm") || ("Arham 4") || ("pure k0") || ("runewings317") || ("Fridder"));
			if (c.isOneOfcannotLogOff = true) {
				endlessPathofMage = true;
				stopMageAtDeath = false;
			}
		}
	} //Why didnt it work?
}

Thanks,
Arham
